info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pennington County through 700 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mystic, or 7 miles north of Hill City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea to nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pactola Reservoir around 635 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hill City and Sheridan Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for west central South Dakota.
